title: Bleed Black
content: This is my first go at type design, I tried to create a classic looking typeface combined with spikes from punk rock culture.
author: banky

comments.content:
Mitchell --   
   
Looks like a good start. In what sort of project were you thinking of using the font?
The Font could be used by bands on the record and or merch. It could be used for stores catering to punk rock, as well as clubs. That was the target audience I had in mind.

I need to ask for everyones help. I am thinking of coming up with a different name. I would like it to start with X if possible as that is my favorite character in my design. I would also like it to stay with the punk theme if possible or anything clever. Xploited maybe, just straight up X?

I made some revisions to the "s" and "j" let me know what you think about it.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018041238im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/9177.jpg)
I think the spikes need to be slightly bigger, because they may get lost when printed in relatively small sizes or viewed form far, aslo i would revise the M, it

Another nice victorian type face.   
   
How about a lower case to match the capitals as wells as a condensed version, all with alternates?   
   
 Yours truly,   
 Robert
